sentences.en: A mind bent on returning is like an arrow.
An arrow pointed to the toilets.
An arrow with a four - edged head is shot from a crossbow.
sentences.cn: 有四面刃头的箭是从石弓发出来的.

sentences.en: Follow the arrows to the X-ray department.
sentences.cn: 顺着箭头指示的方向去X光科。

sentences.en: He drew the bow and shot an arrow.
He was armed with a bow and arrow .
He was shot in the shoulder with an arrow.
The archer strung his bow and aimed an arrow at the target.
sentences.cn: 弓箭手拉紧弓弦将箭瞄准靶子.

sentences.en: The arrow flew off and hit the bull's eye.
sentences.cn: 箭离弦飞去,射中了那靶心.

sentences.en: The hunter lodged an arrow in the tiger's head.
sentences.cn: 猎人一箭射中老虎的头.

sentences.en: The letter was nailed to the wall with an arrow.
sentences.cn: 一支箭把信钉在了墙上.

sentences.en: The modern airplane can arrow upward to 20, 000 feet.
sentences.cn: 现代的飞机能够如箭般地飞达20, 000英尺的高度.

sentences.en: Turn right where you see a waymark arrow.
sentences.cn: 看到箭头路标就向右转。

sentences.en: Use the arrow keys to scroll through the list of files.
sentences.cn: 用箭头键把文件目录滚动一遍。

sentences.en: Warriors armed with bows and arrows and spears have invaded their villages.
sentences.cn: 佩有弓箭和长矛的武士们已入侵了他们的村庄。
